title: Mirror Games launches arcade favourite Astro Fire for your smartphone
text:
When Astro Fire was released in 1994, Wet WetWet had a number one with ‘Love Is All Around’ for what seemed like an eternity.
Astro Fire is an asteroid blasting game with lots of levels, seventy five to be exact, and plenty of alien spaceships to have a go at.
Click here to download
The game was originally intended for arcade use, but thanks to the wonders of modern technology and the clever chaps at Mirror Games, it has received a smartphone makeover.
Making it a perfect game to play on your way to work or school, with your mates, or whilst chilling out on the sofa.
The game is dead easy to play, the overlay controls spin your aircraft left and right and you can move and shoot, with a rapid fire option in-built.
This really is the game to play if you like the feel of a retro game but with all the comfort of smartphone technology.
Due to the clever controls we’ve deployed, we make a small 99p charge for the game.
It really is worth it though just to see how good these old arcade games really were.
Oh, don’t forget to ask for the bill payer’s permission before you download the game.
At Mirror Games, we’re committed to bringing you the latest games so please keep coming back over the coming months as we bring you different titles to enjoy.
We’re always happy to receive feedback so please feel free to contact us by emailing feedback@mirrorgames.com
